thread.title: Progress: Mahatma Otoo grabs brace to send Sogndal into Norwegian top flight
thread.title_full: Progress: Mahatma Otoo grabs brace to send Sogndal into Norwegian top flight

title: Progress: Mahatma Otoo grabs brace to send Sogndal into Norwegian top flight
text:
21:11 CET Progress: Mahatma Otoo grabs brace to send Sogndal into Norwegian top flight - www.allsports.com.gh 
Ghanaian forward Mahatma Otoo scored twice on Sunday to help his Sogndal side qualify to Norwegian top flight in the Norway OBOS-ligaen. 
Otoo and his side scored five goals away from home while conceding two in the seven-goal thriller against Hoenefoss. play
